Name: Pilgrim Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Whether you serve this hot or cold, it's a delicately spiced drink to warm the cockles.
Nutrition: One serving of Pilgrim Cocktail contains 179 calories
